plays.text: Penalty to Stan Neckar 2 minutes for High Sticking Todd White
Penalty to Cory Sarich 2 minutes for High Sticking Radek Bonk
Goal scored by Sami Salo assisted by Radek Bonk and Chris Phillips
Penalty to Pavel Kubina 2 minutes for Roughing Shawn McEachern

Goal scored by Sheldon Keefe assisted by Vaclav Prospal and Cory Sarich

Penalty to Shane Hnidy 2 minutes for Tripping Ben Clymer
Goal scored by Marian Hossa assisted by Radek Bonk
Penalty to Bill Muckalt 2 minutes for Boarding Ben Clymer
Goal scored by Radek Bonk assisted by Marian Hossa
Penalty to Chris Phillips 2 minutes for Holding Sheldon Keefe
Penalty to Vaclav Prospal 2 minutes for Slashing Benoit Brunet
